item.title: Automation Vs Humans
item.description: Flying cars may not be here but automation is just next door. And it's knocking hard! I take a broad look at what are the primary impacts of automation & how can we benefit from it.
item.keywords: Blockchain, IoT, Blockchain, Development, AI, Scalability, Service, Automation, Management, Obsolete, Evolution

item.title: Illenium - Beautiful Creatures (feat MAX)
item.description: Illenium is one of my favourite artist, and here is my (hopefully) soulful vesion to his groovy music [AuM Edit]
item.keywords: Illenium, Beautiful Creatures, Beautiful, Music, Chill, AuM, Aum Edit, Instrumental, Ableton, After Effect, MAX

item.title: What is your story ?
item.description: We are all story tellers. Good, bad, ugly, whatever. Is that's all we are all looking for?
item.keywords: Dehradun, story, delhi, hiring, depths, emotions, redemption, inspiring, social, cause, lucknow, DIT, Smart Joules, technology

item.title: Norwegian Wood by Haruki Murakami
item.description: Norwegian Wood is a heartstoppingly moving story about love and loss, set in 1960's Japan. This is my experience reading it.
item.keywords: book review, murakami, norwegian wood, review, ya, yalit, beatles, japan, depression, death, bildungsroman

item.title: Automation Spiral
item.description: Let's put the recent development practices under a microscope, and dig into the very idea of automation. Things seems to be growning in this space. But are things growing towards a goal, or, growing out of control?
item.keywords: Software, IoT, Development, AI, Scalability, Service, Architecture, Evolution

item.title: Evolution of communication
item.description: Communications system have evolved drastically. Internet in it's own essence has evolved. This new age internet of assets promises a future of immense poosibilites.
item.keywords: IOT, Internet, Internet of things, Data, AI, Artificial Intellignece, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency, Telecommunication, Electronics, Evolution, Future
